SUSSURROS.captureErrorAudio: Unable to capture from your Audio device
SUSSURROS.debugHint: Enables debug and info logging levels
SUSSURROS.disableAvClientHint: If you are using another AV client such as the Jitsi WebRTC module, automatically disable your AV microphone when sending a message with Sussuros. Ignored when using "Toggle sending audio"
SUSSURROS.toggleBroadcastHint: Toggle the sending of audio to users instead of requiring that the microphone button be held down
